Hey Sejal
What we are trying to accomplish is the ability to integrate in-app chat that we have in our Web App.
So using the custom CRM cards I'm creating a form from where HubSpot owner can send message to a user through integration (using serverless function and API call). So I need a form field which accepts multiline just like in workflow actions (Yes, text-area/html). Also when we submit the form (send the message), I wanted to clear the form (reset).
I had tried adding a new tag object in sections when sending response after the submit but still it doesn't come up in UI.

> the ability to integrate in-app chat that we have in our Web App.
May I ask which web app is that? Are you trying to hoping to build a conversational messaging?
